sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground } from 'docz'; import Card from '../card.js'; import FlexContainer from '../flex-container'; import FlexItem from '../flex-item'; export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`Flex Container`} {`The Flex Container give you options to control the flex properties of that element:`} {`Inline`} {`This props create a `}{`display: inline-flex`}{` element`} Flex Item 1 Flex Item 2 Flex Item 3 Flex Item 4 Flex Item 5 {`Width`} {`This props defines the width of the flex element`} Flex Item 1 Flex Item 2 Flex Item 3 Flex Item 4 Flex Item 5 {`Height`} {`This props
